Uses of Class
org.ensembl.datamodel.CoordinateSystem

Packages that use CoordinateSystem
org.ensembl.datamodel Data types that appear in the core ensembl databases such as Genes, Exons and Karyotypes and various support classes such as Location. 
org.ensembl.driver Driver and adaptors for accessing ensembl core databases.
